revised_title: Tuna Fisheries and Oceanic Conditions in the Indian Ocean
tldr: The article discusses the global growth of tuna fisheries, focusing on the Yellowfin Tuna in the Indian Ocean. It explores the relationship between tuna abundance and oceanic conditions, such as current systems and the thermocline. The author also examines various fishing techniques, including long-line fishing, and their effectiveness in catching tuna.
